alert.note: Alert for Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:24PM CDT until May 17 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR YORK AND SOUTHEASTERN POLK COUNTIES... At 1024 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Benedict to near Bradshaw, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... York, Bradshaw, Waco, Benedict, Gresham and Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 346 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
